alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Toole and Liberty (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 2:21PM MST until December 02 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph, with wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera and Eastern Toole and Liberty. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Wind chills may cause frost bite to exposed skin in 30 minutes. The hazardous conditions could impact peak travel times Thursday morning through Friday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Toole and Liberty
